data.text: @irtizamoinul @Praecursator007 The theory is an indoctrination of slavery. Money is not food and food will never be money. Everyone should be able to produce their own food

@irtizamoinul @Praecursator007 there is nothing like global warming. Abandoning of agriculture by individuals is a very dumb move. If we don't produce food, who will do it for us?, are they trust worthy enough to produce our own food even if we have someone to do it for us?. That theory is an indoctrination
@pacifier8141 @Praecursator007 在中国，也存在你说的，西方控制的学者建议中国放弃农业，粮食改为进口，而空闲下来的土地改成商业用途。理论上全球变暖会变出更多适合农业土地，但极端气候反而会造成更多农业损失。

@irtizamoinul @Praecursator007 All the supply chain is almost dismantled & this my friend is worse than famine. If you want to know more, follow ice age farmer on telegram or You tube. There is deliberate monopoly of the supply chain of food by the oligarchs & they are disrupting independent food production

@irtizamoinul @Praecursator007 Yeah, artificial famine from climate change. That is BS. Go and check all the major farmlands in the world and you will see either terrorism, banditry, kidnappings, corporate financial terrorism and impoverishing of farmers deliberately so that they will produce no grains
@Praecursator007 Those a_holes think all of the scriptures revolve around their small existence, instead of the world as a whole....been sick of this for years.
